entities: United Nations Assistance Mission for Iraq
summary:
The Security Council,
Reaffirming previous resolutions on Iraq, including 1483 (2003) and 1500 (2003), and on threats to peace and security caused by terrorist acts, 
Underscoring Iraq's sovereignty, 
Reaffirming the Iraqi people's right to determine their own political future and control natural resources, 
Recognizing international support's importance, 
Welcoming the Governing Council's decision to form a preparatory constitutional committee, 
Condemning recent terrorist attacks, 
Determining the situation in Iraq continues to threaten international peace and security, 
Acting under Chapter VII of the Charter,
